Krisztián Hofstädter

Hey there! I’m tEdör, a Hungarian interdisciplinary researcher living in England.

Now

  • Developing each chapter of my PhD thesis into research papers for relevant journals as an independent researcher.
  • Working on Prof Mariana López’s Enhancing Audio Description II project as a postdoc at the University of York.
  • Preparing a new syllabus for the Navigating the Digital World module as part-time lecturer at the University of Essex and running audio recording and editing workshops.
  • Developing a personalized zettlekasten method in Visual Studio Code using Foam.

Past

  • Check out my music on Bandcamp and videos on YouTube. My CV is here.
